body: Please tell the version of your gcc, maybe you should upgrade gcc.

Yes CentOS6 is not well supported without any upgrades. PHP is stuck at 5.3.3, which has long been unsupported. gcc is at 4.4 and libtool is at 2.2. All of which have been pretty old. 

I managed to upgrade PHP to 5.5, gcc to 4.8 and libtool to 2.4 in CentOS6 and I am able to compile the grpc extension from source (by cloning this repo). 

```
libtool: install: cp ./.libs/grpc.so /home/stanleycheung/grpc/src/php/ext/grpc/modules/grpc.so
libtool: install: cp ./.libs/grpc.lai /home/stanleycheung/grpc/src/php/ext/grpc/modules/grpc.la
libtool: finish: PATH="/opt/rh/devtoolset-2/root/usr/bin:/usr/local/bin:/bin:/usr/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/sbin:/sbin:/home/stanleycheung/bin:/sbin" ldconfig -n /home/stanleycheung/grpc/src/php/ext/grpc/modules
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Libraries have been installed in:
   /home/stanleycheung/grpc/src/php/ext/grpc/modules

If you ever happen to want to link against installed libraries
in a given directory, LIBDIR, you must either use libtool, and
specify the full pathname of the library, or use the `-LLIBDIR'
flag during linking and do at least one of the following:
   - add LIBDIR to the `LD_LIBRARY_PATH' environment variable
     during execution
   - add LIBDIR to the `LD_RUN_PATH' environment variable
     during linking
   - use the `-Wl,-rpath -Wl,LIBDIR' linker flag
   - have your system administrator add LIBDIR to `/etc/ld.so.conf'

See any operating system documentation about shared libraries for
more information, such as the ld(1) and ld.so(8) manual pages.
----------------------------------------------------------------------

Build complete.
oDon't forget to run 'make test'.

[stanleycheung@stanleycheung-centos6 grpc]$ sudo make install
Installing shared extensions:     /usr/lib64/php/modules/

[stanleycheung@stanleycheung-centos6 grpc]$ rpm --query centos-release
centos-release-6-8.el6.centos.12.3.x86_64

[stanleycheung@stanleycheung-centos6 grpc]$ gcc --version
gcc (GCC) 4.8.2 20140120 (Red Hat 4.8.2-15)
Copyright (C) 2013 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.


[stanleycheung@stanleycheung-centos6 grpc]$ libtool --version
libtool (GNU libtool) 2.4.6
Written by Gordon Matzigkeit, 1996

Copyright (C) 2014 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

[stanleycheung@stanleycheung-centos6 grpc]$ php --version
PHP 5.5.38 (cli) (built: Jul 20 2016 16:01:37) 
Copyright (c) 1997-2015 The PHP Group
Zend Engine v2.5.0, Copyright (c) 1998-2015 Zend Technologies

[stanleycheung@stanleycheung-centos6 grpc]$ pecl version
PEAR Version: 1.10.1
PHP Version: 5.5.38
Zend Engine Version: 2.5.0
Running on: Linux stanleycheung-centos6 2.6.32-642.3.1.el6.x86_64 #1 SMP Tue Jul 12 18:30:56 UTC 2016 x86_64

[stanleycheung@stanleycheung-centos6 grpc]$ php -d extension=grpc.so -r "echo Grpc\STATUS_CANCELLED.\"\n\";"
1
```
